StringReg.Description: Name of the manufacturer of the device.

StringReg.ToolTip: Version of the firmware in the device.
StringReg.Description: Version of the firmware in the device.

StringReg.Name: DeviceSerialNumber
StringReg.Description: Device`s serial number. This string is a unique identifier of the device.

Integer.Name: DeviceSFNCVersionMajor
Integer.ToolTip: Major version of the Standard Features Naming Convention that was used to create the device`s GenICam XML.
Integer.Description: Major version of the Standard Features Naming Convention that was used to create the device`s GenICam XML.

Integer.Name: DeviceSFNCVersionMinor
Integer.ToolTip: Minor version of the Standard Features Naming Convention that was used to create the device`s GenICam XML.
Integer.Description: Minor version of the Standard Features Naming Convention that was used to create the device`s GenICam XML.

Integer.Name: DeviceSFNCVersionSubMinor
Integer.ToolTip: Sub minor version of Standard Features Naming Convention that was used to create the device`s GenICam XML.
Integer.Description: Sub minor version of Standard Features Naming Convention that was used to create the device`s GenICam XML.

Integer.Name: DeviceLinkSpeed
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the speed of transmission negotiated on the specified Link.
Integer.Description: Indicates the speed of transmission negotiated on the specified Link.

Integer.Name: DeviceMaxThroughput
Integer.ToolTip: Maximum bandwidth of the data that can be streamed out of the device.
Integer.Description: Maximum bandwidth of the data that can be streamed out of the device. This can be used to estimate if the connection can sustain transfer of free-running images from the camera at its maximum speed.

Command.Name: DeviceReset
Command.ToolTip: Resets the device to its power up state.
Command.Description: Resets the device to its power up state.

Enumeration.Name: DeviceTemperatureSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the location within the device, where the temperature will be measured.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the location within the device, where the temperature will be measured.

EnumEntry.Name: Sensor
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Temperature of the image sensor of the camera.
EnumEntry.Description: Temperature of the image sensor of the camera.

EnumEntry.Name: Mainboard
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Temperature of the device`s mainboard.
EnumEntry.Description: Temperature of the device`s mainboard.

Float.Name: DeviceTemperature
Float.ToolTip: Device temperature in degrees Celsius (C).
Float.Description: Device temperature in degrees Celsius (C). It is measured at the location selected by DeviceTemperatureSelector.

Integer.Name: DeviceInitialDelay
Integer.ToolTip: Specifies the delay in timestamp ticks to apply after the reception of a frame before sending out data.
Integer.Description: Specifies the delay in timestamp ticks to apply after the reception of a frame before sending out data.

Integer.Name: DeviceSensorClock
Integer.ToolTip: Specifies the sensor reference clock.
Integer.Description: Specifies the sensor reference clock.

Integer.Name: PayloadSize
Integer.ToolTip: Provides the number of bytes transferred for each image or chunk on the stream channel.
Integer.Description: Provides the number of bytes transferred for each image or chunk on the stream channel. This includes any end-of-line, end-of-frame statistics or other stamp data. This is the total size of data payload for a data block.

Integer.Name: GevVersionMajor
Integer.ToolTip: Major version of the specification.
Integer.Description: Major version of the specification.

Integer.Name: GevVersionMinor
Integer.ToolTip: Minor version of the specification.
Integer.Description: Minor version of the specification.

Integer.Description: Controls the current heartbeat timeout in milliseconds.

IntReg.ToolTip: Heartbeat timeout register.

Integer.Name: GevTimestampTickFrequency
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the number of timestamp ticks in 1 second (frequency in Hz).
Integer.Description: Indicates the number of timestamp ticks in 1 second (frequency in Hz).

IntSwissKnife.ToolTip: Combines timestamp values to one value.

Command.ToolTip: Latches the current timestamp counter into GevTimestampValue.
Command.Description: Latches the current timestamp counter into GevTimestampValue.

Command.Name: GevTimestampControlReset
Command.ToolTip: Resets the timestamp counter to 0.
Command.Description: Resets the timestamp counter to 0.

Integer.Name: GevTimestampValue
Integer.ToolTip: Returns the latched 64-bit value of the timestamp counter.
Integer.Description: Returns the latched 64-bit value of the timestamp counter.

Float.Name: GevTimestampTime
Float.ToolTip: Returns the latched time value of the timestamp counter.
Float.Description: Returns the latched time value of the timestamp counter.

IntReg.Name: GevTimestampTickFrequencyHighReg
IntReg.Description: 64-bit value indicating the number of timestamp clock tick in 1 second. This register holds the most significant bytes. Timestamp tick frequency is 0 if timestamp is not supported.

IntReg.Name: GevTimestampTickFrequencyLowReg
IntReg.Description: 64-bit value indicating the number of timestamp clock tick in 1 second. This register holds the least significant bytes. Timestamp tick frequency is 0 if timestamp is not supported.

IntReg.Name: GevTimestampValueHighReg
IntReg.ToolTip: Latched value of the timestamp (most significant bytes)

IntReg.Name: GevTimestampValueLowReg
IntReg.ToolTip: Latched value of the timestamp (least significant bytes)

IntReg.Name: GevDiscoveryAckDelay
IntReg.ToolTip: Indicates the maximum randomized delay the device will wait to acknowledge a discovery command.
IntReg.Description: Indicates the maximum randomized delay the device will wait to acknowledge a discovery command.

Boolean.Description: Enables the generation of extended status codes.

Boolean.ToolTip: Enables the generation of PENDING_ACK.
Boolean.Description: Enables the generation of PENDING_ACK.

Boolean.Description: Disables the GVCP heartbeat.

IntReg.Description: Indicates the longest GVCP command execution time before a device returns a PENDING_ACK.

IntReg.Description: Controls the key to use to authenticate primary application switchover requests.

Enumeration.Description: Controls the device access privilege of an application.

IntReg.Description: Returns the UDP source port of the primary application.

IntReg.Description: Returns the address of the primary application.

IntReg.Description: Bootstrap message channel capability register.

IntReg.Description: Indicates the number of message channels supported by this device.

Integer.Description: Controls the port to which the device must send messages. Setting this value to 0 closes the message channel.

IntReg.ToolTip: Controls the destination IP address for the message channel.
IntReg.Description: Controls the destination IP address for the message channel.

IntReg.Name: GevMCTT
IntReg.ToolTip: Provides the transmission timeout value in milliseconds.
IntReg.Description: Provides the transmission timeout value in milliseconds.

IntReg.Name: GevMCRC
IntReg.ToolTip: Controls the number of retransmissions allowed when a message channel message times out.
IntReg.Description: Controls the number of retransmissions allowed when a message channel message times out.

IntReg.Name: GevMCSP
IntReg.ToolTip: This feature indicates the source port for the message channel.
IntReg.Description: This feature indicates the source port for the message channel.

IntSwissKnife.Name: GevStreamChannelSelectorSupported
IntSwissKnife.ToolTip: Gets whether the stream channel selector is supported.

IntSwissKnife.ToolTip: Base address for stream channel registers of selected index.

IntReg.Name: GevStreamChannelCount
IntReg.ToolTip: Indicates the number of stream channels supported by this device.
IntReg.Description: Indicates the number of stream channels supported by this device.

StructReg.ToolTip: Indicates the capabilities of the stream channels supported by this device.

Integer.Name: GevStreamChannelSelector
Integer.ToolTip: Selects the stream channel to control.
Integer.Description: Selects the stream channel to control.

Boolean.Name: GevSCCFGUnconditionalStreaming
Boolean.ToolTip: Enables the camera to continue to stream, for this stream channel, if its control channel is closed or regardless of the reception of any ICMP messages (such as destination unreachable messages).
Boolean.Description: Enables the camera to continue to stream, for this stream channel, if its control channel is closed or regardless of the reception of any ICMP messages (such as destination unreachable messages).

Boolean.Name: GevSCCFGExtendedChunkData
Boolean.ToolTip: Enables cameras to use the extended chunk data payload type for this stream channel.
Boolean.Description: Enables cameras to use the extended chunk data payload type for this stream channel.

Enumeration.Name: GevSCPDirection
Enumeration.ToolTip: Reports the direction of the stream channel.
Enumeration.Description: Reports the direction of the stream channel.

Integer.Name: GevSCPInterfaceIndex
Integer.ToolTip: Index of network interface to use.
Integer.Description: Index of network interface to use.

Integer.Name: GevSCPHostPort
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the port of the selected channel to which a GVSP transmitter must send data stream or the port from which a GVSP receiver may receive data stream.
Integer.Description: Controls the port of the selected channel to which a GVSP transmitter must send data stream or the port from which a GVSP receiver may receive data stream. Setting this value to 0 closes the stream channel.

Command.Name: GevSCPSFireTestPacket
Command.ToolTip: Sends a test packet.
Command.Description: Sends a test packet. When this feature is set, the device will fire one test packet.

Boolean.Name: GevSCPSDoNotFragment
Boolean.ToolTip: The state of this feature is copied into the "do not fragment" bit of IP header of each stream packet.
Boolean.Description: The state of this feature is copied into the "do not fragment" bit of IP header of each stream packet. It can be used by the application to prevent IP fragmentation of packets on the stream channel.

Boolean.Name: GevSCPSBigEndian
Boolean.ToolTip: Endianess of multi-byte pixel data for this stream.
Boolean.Description: Endianess of multi-byte pixel data for this stream.

Integer.Name: GevSCPSPacketSize
Integer.ToolTip: Specifies the stream packet size, in bytes, to send on the selected channel for a GVSP transmitter or specifies the maximum packet size supported by a GVSP receiver.
Integer.Description: Specifies the stream packet size, in bytes, to send on the selected channel for a GVSP transmitter or specifies the maximum packet size supported by a GVSP receiver.

StructEntry.Name: GevSCPSDoNotFragmentReg
StructEntry.ToolTip: Bootstrap SCPS register do not fragment.

StructEntry.Name: GevSCPSFireTestPacketReg
StructEntry.ToolTip: Bootstrap SCPS register fire test packet.

Integer.Name: GevSCPD
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the delay (in timestamp counter unit) to insert between each packet for this stream channel.
Integer.Description: Controls the delay (in timestamp counter unit) to insert between each packet for this stream channel. This can be used as a crude flow-control mechanism if the application or the network infrastructure cannot keep up with the packets coming from the device.

IntReg.Name: GevSCDA
IntReg.ToolTip: Controls the destination IP address of the selected stream channel to which a GVSP transmitter must send data stream or the destination IP address from which a GVSP receiver may receive data stream.
IntReg.Description: Controls the destination IP address of the selected stream channel to which a GVSP transmitter must send data stream or the destination IP address from which a GVSP receiver may receive data stream.

IntReg.Name: GevSCSP
IntReg.ToolTip: Indicates the source port of the stream channel.
IntReg.Description: Indicates the source port of the stream channel.
IntReg.DisplayName: Gev SCSP Stream Channel Source Port

IntReg.Name: GevSCC
IntReg.ToolTip: Indicates the capability of the stream channel.

IntReg.Name: GevSCCFG
IntReg.ToolTip: Indicates the configuration of the stream channel.

Integer.Description: Total number of bytes between 2 successive lines. This feature is used to facilitate alignment of image data.

Integer.Name: RegionNumber

Integer.Description: Sequence of exposures.

Enumeration.Name: RegionSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the Region of interest to control.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the Region of interest to control. The RegionSelector feature allows devices that are able to extract multiple regions out of an image, to configure the features of those individual regions independently.

EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selected feature will control the region 0.
EnumEntry.Description: Selected feature will control the region 0.

EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selected feature will control the region 1.
EnumEntry.Description: Selected feature will control the region 1.

EnumEntry.Name: Region2

EnumEntry.Description: Selected feature will control the region 2.

EnumEntry.Name: Region3
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selected feature will control the region 3.
EnumEntry.Description: Selected feature will control the region 3.

Integer.ToolTip: Width of the image provided by the device (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Width of the image provided by the device (in pixels).

Integer.Name: Height
Integer.ToolTip: Height of the image provided by the device (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Height of the image provided by the device (in pixels).

Integer.Description: Horizontal offset from the origin to the region of interest (in pixels).

Integer.Description: Vertical offset from the origin to the region of interest (in pixels).

Integer.Description: Maximum width of the image (in pixels). The dimension is calculated after horizontal binning, decimation or any other function changing the horizontal dimension of the image.

Integer.Name: HeightMax
Integer.ToolTip: Maximum height of the image (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Maximum height of the image (in pixels). This dimension is calculated after vertical binning, decimation or any other function changing the vertical dimension of the image

Integer.ToolTip: Width of 2nd SIMR vertical band (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Width of 2nd SIMR vertical band (in pixels). WidthBand2=0 turns off 2nd vertical band.

Integer.Name: HeightBand2
Integer.ToolTip: Height of 2nd SIMR horizontal band (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Height of 2nd SIMR horizontal band (in pixels). HeightBand2=0 turns off 2nd horizontal band.

Integer.Name: GapXBand2

Integer.Description: Horizontal gap between 1st and 2nd SIMR vertical band (in pixels).

Integer.Name: GapYBand2

Integer.Description: Vertical gap between 1st and 2nd SIMR horizontal band (in pixels).

Integer.Description: Width of 3nd SIMR vertical band (in pixels). WidthBand3=0 turns off 3nd vertical band.

Integer.Name: HeightBand3
Integer.ToolTip: Height of 3nd SIMR horizontal band (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Height of 3nd SIMR horizontal band (in pixels). HeightBand3=0 turns off 3nd horizontal band.

Integer.Name: GapXBand3

Integer.Description: Horizontal gap between 2nd and 3nd SIMR vertical band (in pixels).

Integer.Name: GapYBand3

Integer.Name: WidthBand4

Integer.Description: Width of 4nd SIMR vertical band (in pixels). WidthBand4=0 turns off 4nd vertical band.

Integer.Name: HeightBand4

Integer.Description: Height of 4nd SIMR horizontal band (in pixels). HeightBand4=0 turns off 4nd horizontal band.

Integer.Description: Horizontal gap between 3nd and 4nd SIMR vertical band (in pixels).

Integer.Name: GapYBand4

Float.Description: Exposure for this roi in manual mode

Enumeration.Name: BinningHorizontal
Enumeration.ToolTip: Number of horizontal photo-sensitive cells to combine together.
Enumeration.Description: Number of horizontal photo-sensitive cells to combine together. This increases the intensity (or signal to noise ratio) of the pixels and reduces the horizontal resolution (width) of the image.

Enumeration.Name: BinningVertical
Enumeration.ToolTip: Number of vertical photo-sensitive cells to combine together.
Enumeration.Description: Number of vertical photo-sensitive cells to combine together. This increases the intensity (or signal to noise ratio) of the pixels and reduces the vertical resolution (height) of the image.

Enumeration.Name: Binning
Enumeration.ToolTip: Number of horizontal and vertical photo-sensitive cells to combine together.
Enumeration.Description: Number of horizontal and vertical photo-sensitive cells to combine together. This increases the intensity (or signal to noise ratio) of the pixels and reduces the horizontal and vertical resolution of the image.

Integer.Name: DecimationHorizontal
Integer.ToolTip: Horizontal sub-sampling of the image.
Integer.Description: Horizontal sub-sampling of the image. This reduces the horizontal resolution (width) of the image by the specified horizontal decimation factor.

Integer.Name: DecimationVertical
Integer.ToolTip: Vertical sub-sampling of the image.
Integer.Description: Vertical sub-sampling of the image. This reduces the vertical resolution (height) of the image by the specified vertical decimation factor.

Boolean.Name: ReverseX
Boolean.ToolTip: Flip horizontally the image sent by the device.
Boolean.Description: Flip horizontally the image sent by the device. The Region of interest is applied after the flipping.

Boolean.Name: ReverseY
Boolean.ToolTip: Flip vertically the image sent by the device.
Boolean.Description: Flip vertically the image sent by the device. The Region of interest is applied after the flipping.

Enumeration.Name: AcquisitionMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the acquisition mode of the device.
Enumeration.Description: Sets the acquisition mode of the device. It defines mainly the number of frames to capture during an acquisition and the way the acquisition stops.

EnumEntry.Name: SingleFrame
EnumEntry.ToolTip: One frame is captured.
EnumEntry.Description: One frame is captured.

EnumEntry.Name: MultiFrame
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The number of frames specified by AcquisitionFrameCount is captured.
EnumEntry.Description: The number of frames specified by AcquisitionFrameCount is captured.

EnumEntry.Name: Continuous
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Frames are captured continuously until stopped with the AcquisitionStop command.
EnumEntry.Description: Frames are captured continuously until stopped with the AcquisitionStop command.

Command.Name: AcquisitionStart
Command.ToolTip: Starts the Acquisition of the device.
Command.Description: Starts the Acquisition of the device. The number of frames captured is specified by AcquisitionMode.

Command.Name: AcquisitionStop
Command.ToolTip: Stops the Acquisition of the device at the end of the current Frame.
Command.Description: Stops the Acquisition of the device at the end of the current Frame. It is mainly used when AcquisitionMode is Continuous but can be used in any acquisition mode.

Command.Name: AcquisitionAbort
Command.ToolTip: Aborts the Acquisition immediately.
Command.Description: Aborts the Acquisition immediately. This will end the capture without completing the current Frame or waiting on a trigger. If no Acquisition is in progress, the command is ignored.

Integer.Name: AcquisitionFrameCount
Integer.ToolTip: Number of frames to acquire in MultiFrame Acquisition mode.
Integer.Description: Number of frames to acquire in MultiFrame Acquisition mode.

Integer.Name: AcquisitionBurstFrameCount
Integer.ToolTip: Number of frames to acquire for each FrameBurstStart trigger.
Integer.Description: Number of frames to acquire for each FrameBurstStart trigger.

Float.Name: AcquisitionFrameRate
Float.ToolTip: Controls the acquisition rate (in Hertz) at which the frames are captured.
Float.Description: Controls the acquisition rate (in Hertz) at which the frames are captured. AcquisitionFrameRate=0-->as fast as possible

Boolean.Name: FrameBufferEnable
Boolean.ToolTip: Enable camera frame buffer.
Boolean.Description: Enable camera frame buffer.

Enumeration.Name: ShutterMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Shutter Mode
Enumeration.Description: Shutter Mode

Enumeration.Name: TriggerSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the type of trigger to configure.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the type of trigger to configure.

EnumEntry.Name: FrameStart
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects a trigger starting the capture of one frame.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects a trigger starting the capture of one frame.

EnumEntry.Name: FrameBurstStart
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects a trigger starting the capture of the bursts of frames in an acquisition. AcquisitionBurstFrameCount controls the length of each burst unless a FrameBurstEnd trigger is active. The total number of frames captured is also conditioned by AcquisitionFrameCount if AcquisitionMode is MultiFrame.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects a trigger starting the capture of the bursts of frames in an acquisition. AcquisitionBurstFrameCount controls the length of each burst unless a FrameBurstEnd trigger is active. The total number of frames captured is also conditioned by AcquisitionFrameCount if AcquisitionMode is MultiFrame.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls if the selected trigger is active.
Enumeration.Description: Controls if the selected trigger is active.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Disables the selected trigger.
EnumEntry.Description: Disables the selected trigger.

EnumEntry.Name: On
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Enable the selected trigger.
EnumEntry.Description: Enable the selected trigger.

Command.Name: TriggerSoftware
Command.ToolTip: Generates an internal trigger.
Command.Description: Generates an internal trigger. TriggerSource must be set to Software.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerSource
Enumeration.ToolTip: Specifies the internal signal or physical input Line to use as the trigger source.
Enumeration.Description: Specifies the internal signal or physical input Line to use as the trigger source. The selected trigger must have its TriggerMode set to On.

EnumEntry.Name: Software
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies that the trigger source will be generated by software using the TriggerSoftware command.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies that the trigger source will be generated by software using the TriggerSoftware command.

EnumEntry.Name: Line1
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies which physical line (or pin) and associated I/O control block to use as external source for the trigger signal.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies which physical line (or pin) and associated I/O control block to use as external source for the trigger signal.

EnumEntry.Name: Test
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies which physical line (or pin) and associated I/O control block to use as external source for the trigger signal.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies which physical line (or pin) and associated I/O control block to use as external source for the trigger signal.

EnumEntry.Name: AquisitionFrameRateTimer
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Use timer with acquisition frame rate.
EnumEntry.Description: Use timer with acquisition frame rate.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerActivation
Enumeration.ToolTip: Specifies the activation mode of the trigger.
Enumeration.Description: Specifies the activation mode of the trigger.

EnumEntry.Name: RisingEdge
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies that the trigger is considered valid on the rising edge of the source signal.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies that the trigger is considered valid on the rising edge of the source signal.

EnumEntry.Name: FallingEdge
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies that the trigger is considered valid on the falling edge of the source signal.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies that the trigger is considered valid on the falling edge of the source signal.

EnumEntry.Name: AnyEdge
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies that the trigger is considered valid on the falling or rising edge of the source signal.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies that the trigger is considered valid on the falling or rising edge of the source signal.

EnumEntry.Name: LevelHigh
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies that the trigger is considered valid as long as the level of the source signal is high.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies that the trigger is considered valid as long as the level of the source signal is high.

EnumEntry.Name: LevelLow
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies that the trigger is considered valid as long as the level of the source signal is low.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies that the trigger is considered valid as long as the level of the source signal is low.

Float.Name: TriggerDelay
Float.ToolTip: Specifies the delay in microseconds (us) to apply after the trigger reception before activating it.
Float.Description: Specifies the delay in microseconds (us) to apply after the trigger reception before activating it.

Float.Name: TriggerLength
Float.ToolTip: Specifies the length in microseconds (us) of the trigger pulse.
Float.Description: Specifies the length in microseconds (us) of the trigger pulse.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerDivider
Enumeration.ToolTip: Specifies a division factor for the incoming trigger pulses.
Enumeration.Description: Specifies a division factor for the incoming trigger pulses.

Enumeration.ToolTip: Specifies the internal signal or physical input line to use as the strobe source.
Enumeration.Description: Specifies the internal signal or physical input line to use as the strobe source.

EnumEntry.Description: Specifies that the strobe source will be generated by the trigger input.

EnumEntry.Name: Exposure
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies that the strobe source will be generated by the sensor exposure signal.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies that the strobe source will be generated by the sensor exposure signal.

Enumeration.ToolTip: Specifies the output mode of the strobe.
Enumeration.Description: Specifies the output mode of the strobe.

EnumEntry.Name: Pulse
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies that the strobe output is a programmable pulse with delay and length.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies that the strobe output is a programmable pulse with delay and length.

EnumEntry.Name: Source
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies that the strobe output is directly derived from strobe source signal.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies that the strobe output is directly derived from strobe source signal.

EnumEntry.Name: Static
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies that the strobe output is static.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies that the strobe output is static.

Boolean.Name: Strobe1Invert
Boolean.ToolTip: Controls the invertion of the strobe signal.
Boolean.Description: Controls the invertion of the strobe signal.

Float.Name: Strobe1Delay
Float.ToolTip: Specifies the delay in microseconds (us) to apply after the trigger reception before activating the strobe output.
Float.Description: Specifies the delay in microseconds (us) to apply after the trigger reception before activating the strobe output.

Float.Name: Strobe1Length
Float.ToolTip: Specifies the length in microseconds (us) of the strobe pulse.
Float.Description: Specifies the length in microseconds (us) of the strobe pulse.

Enumeration.Name: Strobe2Source
Enumeration.ToolTip: Specifies the internal signal or physical input line to use as the strobe source.
Enumeration.Description: Specifies the internal signal or physical input line to use as the strobe source.

EnumEntry.Name: Trigger
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies that the strobe source will be generated by the trigger input.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies that the strobe source will be generated by the trigger input.

EnumEntry.Name: Exposure
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies that the strobe source will be generated by the sensor exposure signal.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies that the strobe source will be generated by the sensor exposure signal.

Enumeration.Description: Specifies the output mode of the strobe.

EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies that the strobe output is a programmable pulse with delay and length.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies that the strobe output is a programmable pulse with delay and length.

EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies that the strobe output is directly derived from strobe source signal.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies that the strobe output is directly derived from strobe source signal.

EnumEntry.Name: Static
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies that the strobe output is static.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies that the strobe output is static.

Boolean.Name: Strobe2Invert
Boolean.ToolTip: Controls the invertion of the strobe signal.
Boolean.Description: Controls the invertion of the strobe signal.

Float.Name: Strobe2Delay
Float.ToolTip: Specifies the delay in microseconds (us) to apply after the trigger reception before activating the strobe output.
Float.Description: Specifies the delay in microseconds (us) to apply after the trigger reception before activating the strobe output.

Float.Name: Strobe2Length
Float.ToolTip: Specifies the length in microseconds (us) of the strobe pulse.
Float.Description: Specifies the length in microseconds (us) of the strobe pulse.

Enumeration.Name: ExposureMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the operation mode of the Exposure (or shutter).
Enumeration.Description: Sets the operation mode of the Exposure (or shutter).

EnumEntry.Name: Timed
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Timed exposure. The exposure duration time is set using the ExposureTime or ExposureAuto features and the exposure starts with the FrameStart or LineStart.
EnumEntry.Description: Timed exposure. The exposure duration time is set using the ExposureTime or ExposureAuto features and the exposure starts with the FrameStart or LineStart.

Float.Name: ExposureTime
Float.ToolTip: Sets the Exposure time when ExposureMode is Timed and ExposureAuto is Off.
Float.Description: Sets the Exposure time when ExposureMode is Timed and ExposureAuto is Off. This controls the duration where the photosensitive cells are exposed to light.

Enumeration.Name: ExposureAuto
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the automatic exposure mode when ExposureMode is Timed.
Enumeration.Description: Sets the automatic exposure mode when ExposureMode is Timed. The exact algorithm used to implement this control is device-specific.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Exposure duration is manually controlled using ExposureTime.
EnumEntry.Description: Exposure duration is manually controlled using ExposureTime.

EnumEntry.Name: Once
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Exposure duration is adapted once by the device. Once it has converged, it returns to the Off state.
EnumEntry.Description: Exposure duration is adapted once by the device. Once it has converged, it returns to the Off state.

EnumEntry.Name: Continuous
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Exposure duration is constantly adapted by the device to maximize the dynamic range.
EnumEntry.Description: Exposure duration is constantly adapted by the device to maximize the dynamic range.

Float.Name: AeTarget
Float.ToolTip: Target average image level for auto exposure.
Float.Description: Target average image level for auto exposure.

Float.Name: AeMinTime
Float.ToolTip: Exposure time min for auto exposure.
Float.Description: Exposure time min for auto exposure.

Float.Name: AeMaxTime
Float.ToolTip: Exposure time max for auto exposure.
Float.Description: Exposure time max for auto exposure.

Float.Name: AeSpeed
Float.ToolTip: Auto exposure speed.
Float.Description: Auto exposure speed.

Enumeration.Name: AeWindow
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the measurement window for automatic exposure mode.
Enumeration.Description: Sets the measurement window for automatic exposure mode.

EnumEntry.Description: full sensor size

EnumEntry.Description: quarter sensor size

Enumeration.Description: Controls the mode for automatic white balancing between the color channels. The white balancing ratios are automatically adjusted.

EnumEntry.ToolTip: White balancing is manually controlled using BalanceRatioSelector and BalanceRatio.
EnumEntry.Description: White balancing is manually controlled using BalanceRatioSelector and BalanceRatio.

EnumEntry.Name: Once
EnumEntry.ToolTip: White balancing is automatically adjusted once by the device. Once it has converged, it automatically returns to the Off state.
EnumEntry.Description: White balancing is automatically adjusted once by the device. Once it has converged, it automatically returns to the Off state.

Integer.Name: EventAcquisitionEndTimestamp
Integer.ToolTip: Returns the Timestamp of the Acquisition End Event.
Integer.Description: Returns the Timestamp of the Acquisition End Event.

Integer.Name: EventFrameTrigger
Integer.ToolTip: Returns the unique Identifier of the FrameTrigger type of Event.
Integer.Description: Returns the unique Identifier of the FrameTrigger type of Event. It can be used to register a callback function to be notified of the event occurrence. Its value uniquely identify the type event received.

Integer.Name: EventFrameTriggerTimestamp
Integer.ToolTip: Returns the Timestamp of the FrameTrigger Event.
Integer.Description: Returns the Timestamp of the FrameTrigger Event. It can be used to determine precisely when the event occured.

Integer.Description: Returns the Timestamp of the Line 1 Rising Edge Event.

Integer.Name: EventLine2RisingEdgeTimestamp
Integer.ToolTip: Returns the Timestamp of the Line 2 Rising Edge Event.
Integer.Description: Returns the Timestamp of the Line 2 Rising Edge Event.

Integer.Name: EventLine1FallingEdge

Integer.Name: EventPingTimestamp

Integer.Description: Returns the Timestamp of the Ping Event.

Integer.Name: EventError
Integer.ToolTip: Returns the unique identifier of the Error type of Event.
Integer.Description: Returns the unique identifier of the Error type of Event. It can be used to register a callback function to be notified of the Error event occurrence. Its value uniquely identify that the event received was an Error.

Integer.Name: EventErrorTimestamp
Integer.ToolTip: Returns the Timestamp of the Error Event.
Integer.Description: Returns the Timestamp of the Error Event. It can be used to determine when the event occured.

Boolean.Name: TransferRequestMode
Boolean.ToolTip: Enables frame data transfer on request only mode.
Boolean.Description: Enables frame data transfer on request only mode.

Command.Name: TransferFrameRequest
Command.Description: Request the transfer of the frame specified with TransferQueueIndex.

Integer.Name: TransferQueueIndex
Integer.ToolTip: Queue index of frame requested for transfer. 0=latest frame.
Integer.Description: Queue index of frame requested for transfer. 0=latest frame.

Integer.Name: TransferFramesAquired
Integer.ToolTip: Number of frames aquired during current aquisition.
Integer.Description: Number of frames aquired during current aquisition.

Integer.Name: TransferBufferSize
Integer.ToolTip: Size of current frame buffer (in number of frames).
Integer.Description: Size of current transfer frame buffer (in number of frames). Size depends of image size, pixel format and DDR memory size

Integer.Name: RowDelay
Integer.ToolTip: Additional horizontal blanking to increase sensor linelength.
Integer.Description: Additional horizontal blanking to increase sensor linelength.

Integer.Name: FrameDelay
Integer.ToolTip: Additional vertical blanking to increase sensor framelength.
Integer.Description: Additional vertical blanking to increase sensor framelength.
